description: This file defines application routing and navigation for a Flutter expense tracking app. It includes route constants, a route generator function, and a root scaffold with bottom navigation.

classes.name: AppRoutes
classes.description: Contains static constants defining route paths used throughout the app.

classes.name: RootScaffold
classes.description: A StatefulWidget managing bottom navigation and switching between main screens.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Generates routes based on route name, creating appropriate widgets for each screen, handling route arguments, and defaulting to a 'not found' scaffold.
